'''Galdor''' was a seneschal of [[Edoras]], described as being old, in the drafts for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>{{WR|3|II}}, p. 262</ref> An earlier name for the character was ''Ealdor''.<ref>{{WR|3|II}}, Note 40, p. 267</ref>
